div.span: Audra made a map of her better room!
Audra is practicing array tables using cereal!
Caiden and Chloe found recycled items to build a cat bed and a toy...
Place a blank piece of paper over coins and do a crayon run and label the coins.
Walking the red carpet social distancing style!

h1.div: Show Some Love to our Health Care Heroes!

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Sing a song. Speak some words of encouragement. Tell somebody you

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: love them. Film yourself sewing masks. How you do it is up to you!

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Tag your picture or short video with

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Challenge three friends to join in.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Need a fun, creative activity for your kids? Download a coloring sheet at

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: . Submissions will be displayed in the halls of SSM Health St. Anthony Hospital so our health care heroes feel your gratitude as they
